==Chinese==
{{zh-forms|dipper|s=斗胆}}

===Etymology===
{{zh-compound|斗|膽|dipper|gallbladder}} Literally meaning to have a gallbladder as big as a dipper. The ancient Chinese believed that having courage was related to having a big gallbladder.
